titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: As I was getting up a sharp attack of lumbago disclosed itself, & reduced me to much helplessness. With the assistance of the Hotel servant I dressed, & went to the Club, & after breakfast crawled to Westminster,
where I attended the Church of State C
